resources.string: Use the buttons on the toolbar to switch between activities.\nFor help, use the help item from the drop down menu in the toolbar.

This is the final project for the course CST2335.
 It consists of 4 main activities each with its own functionality. Each activity is done by a different person in a team. 
 
 1. Living Room: contains living room items
 		Author: Saleh Yassin
 2. Kitchen: contains kitchen items
 		Author: Tryton Vanmeer
 3. House: contains house items
 		Author: Rudwan Al Shama'a
 4. Automobile: contains automobile items
 		Author: Sheldon McGrath
